<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clever Shadow](/Feats.aspx?ID=2506) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fetchling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=300" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
<trait label="Shadow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=143" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 86 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can perform simple Interact actions with your shadow, such as opening an unlocked door. Anything your shadow Interacts with must be within your reach. Your shadow can't perform actions that require significant manual dexterity, including any action that would require a check to accomplish, and you can't use it to hold items.

<title level="2">Clever Shadow leads to...</title>
[Hefting Shadow](/Feats.aspx?ID=2510)
name: Clever Shadow
